movies.title: Love & Mercy
movies.plot: In the late 1960s, the Beach Boys' Brian Wilson stops touring, produces "Pet Sounds" and begins to lose his grip on reality. By the 1980s, Wilson, under the sway of a controlling therapist, finds a savior in Melinda Ledbetter.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 20 wins & 55 nominations.

events.title: Eugene Landy is barred from contacting Brian Wilson
Brian Wilson and Melinda Ledbetter marry
